backend/main.mo: Defines types and access‑controlled storage for users, cashflow, properties, loans, and wealth inputs, with ID generation and profile CRUD.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files used for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining light/dark theme variables and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing offline caching, install/activate lifecycle, and navigation fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring routes, theme provider, AuthGate, profile dialog, AppShell, and service worker registration.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Auth wrapper that simply renders children without authentication checks.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Deprecated login button component returning null.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Local‑profile setup dialog prompting for a display name and saving it via React Query.
Defines the main app layout with header, navigation, mobile menu, content outlet, and footer.
frontend/src/components/navigation/NavLi: Renders navigation buttons with active state detection and optional navigation callback.
frontend/src/features/cashflow/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, summarizing, adding/updating, and deleting cashflow entries.
frontend/src/features/cashflow/component: Displays a table of cashflow entries with edit/delete controls and empty-state handling.
Form card for adding or editing cashflow entries with validation and mutation handling.
Shows summary cards for total to collect, total to give, and net cashflow balance.
frontend/src/features/daily-pl/api.ts: Provides a hook to generate and fetch the daily profit/loss report.
frontend/src/features/daily-pl/component: Renders a sortable daily P/L table with formatted dates and amounts.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/api.ts: Fetches dashboard overview data including net worth, portfolio totals, and monthly cashflow.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/componen: Card showing formatted monthly cashflow from interest income.
Provides buttons for quickly navigating to add loan or property screens.
Renders a donut chart summarizing asset allocation from property, lending, and wealth inputs, with a fallback when no data exists.
frontend/src/features/lending/api.ts: Provides React Query hooks for listing, creating/updating, and deleting loans with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/lending/components: Displays lending analytics including monthly interest bar charts and principal vs interest pie charts, with an empty state when no loans exist.
Form component for adding or editing a loan, handling validation, submission, and field population on edit.
Shows a table of loans with computed totals and actions for editing or deleting entries, including confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/features/mpl/api.ts: Defines React Query hooks for managing MPL matches, entries, P/L summaries, and settlement with related cache updates.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Cre: Dialog form for creating a new match with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Ent: Renders a table of betting entries with loading/empty states and formatted fields like date, rate, and amount.
Provides a form to create a betting entry with validation and submission to the add-entry API.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Mat: Displays detailed match info, entries, P/L summary, and settlement UI with status-specific sections.
Shows a list of user matches with status badges and selection handling; includes empty state messaging.
frontend/src/features/mpl/components/Set: Modal dialog allowing users to select a winning team and settle a match through an API call.
frontend/src/features/mpl/utils/pl.ts: Contains functions to calculate team-specific and opposite P/L values based on betting entries and types.
frontend/src/features/networth/api.ts: React Query hooks to list, update, and aggregate wealth inputs including net worth and related totals.
frontend/src/features/networth/component: Renders summary cards for net worth metrics with icons, gradients, and formatted values.
Form card for entering and updating wealth inputs, prefilled from latest saved data and submitted via mutation.
frontend/src/features/properties/api.ts: React Query hooks for listing, adding/updating, and deleting properties with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/features/properties/compone: Displays properties in a card grid with edit/delete actions and confirmation dialog for deletions.
Form card for adding or editing a property, validating inputs and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom design tokens for light/dark themes and global utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/pages/CashflowPage.tsx: Cashflow page displaying summary, entry form, and entries table with edit support.
frontend/src/pages/DailyProfitLossPage.t: Displays daily cashflow profit/loss totals and a table by fetching a generated daily report.
frontend/src/pages/ExecutiveDashboardPag: Loads and presents high-level financial dashboards including monthly cashflow, quick actions, and wealth distribution.
frontend/src/pages/MatchProfitLossPage.t: Lists matches and shows detailed betting P/L for a selected match with create/edit support.
frontend/src/pages/MoneyLendingPage.tsx: Manages loan creation and editing, and displays loan tables and lending insights.
frontend/src/pages/NetWorthPage.tsx: Fetches and displays net worth summary cards and a form for updating wealth inputs.
frontend/src/pages/PropertyLedgerPage.ts: Manages property records with a form and grid view, supporting create and edit workflows.
frontend/src/pwa/registerServiceWorker.t: Registers the service worker on page load for PWA support.
frontend/src/queryInvalidation.ts: Provides helper functions to invalidate specific React Query caches for app data groups.
frontend/src/queryKeys.ts: Defines centralized React Query keys for all major data entities and subqueries.
frontend/src/storage/aggregates.ts: Computes aggregate totals for properties, loans, wealth inputs, and overall net worth from storage.
frontend/src/storage/cashflowRepo.ts: Handles CRUD operations for cashflow entries and computes total credit/debit summaries.
frontend/src/storage/dailyPl.ts: Generates daily profit/loss summaries by grouping cashflow entries by day.
frontend/src/storage/ids.ts: Generates incremental bigint IDs using an IndexedDB-backed counter store.
frontend/src/storage/indexedDb.ts: Initializes IndexedDB stores and provides generic helpers for CRUD and index-based queries.
frontend/src/storage/loansRepo.ts: CRUD helpers for loans stored in IndexedDB, including ID generation and timestamps.
frontend/src/storage/mplPlSummary.ts: Computes per-team P/L and final score for a match based on betting entries.
frontend/src/storage/mplRepo.ts: Manages matches and betting entries in IndexedDB, including creation, listing, and settlement.
frontend/src/storage/profile.ts: Loads and saves a simple local user profile in the IndexedDB 'profile' store.
frontend/src/storage/propertiesRepo.ts: CRUD utilities for property records with autogenerated IDs and timestamps.
frontend/src/storage/timestamps.ts: Provides a nanosecond-style timestamp based on Date.now().
frontend/src/storage/wealthInputsRepo.ts: CRUD functions for wealth input records stored in IndexedDB.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Formats numbers as INR currency using the Indian locale.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Extracts, stores, retrieves, and clears URL and session parameters for routing/state persistence.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s offline-focused architecture, modules, features, and known issues.
